directions.step:
Toss asparagus with pesto to taste, a little olive oil and minced garlic.
Grill (hot coals) until lightly charred, then serve as is, or with more pesto.
Notes: SF Chronicle 5/13/98
Recipe by: Grilling by Marlena Spieler
Posted to MC-Recipe Digest by Kitpath <phannema@wizard.ucr.edu> on May 14, 1998
